TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit V7TarEntry extends System.Formats.Tar.TarEntry
Public NotInheritable Class V7TarEntry Inherits TarEntry
public ref class V7TarEntry sealed : System::Formats::Tar::TarEntry

Docs.summary: Represents a tar entry from an archive of the V7 format.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Formats.Tar.TarEntryType entryType, string entryName) cil managed
Public Sub New (entryType As TarEntryType, entryName As String)

Docs.param: A string with the path and file name of this entry.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance with the specified entry type and entry name.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
When creating an instance using the <xref:System.Formats.Tar.V7TarEntry.%23ctor(System.Formats.Tar.TarEntryType,System.String)> constructor, only the following entry types are supported: <xref:System.Formats.Tar.TarEntryType.Directory>, <xref:System.Formats.Tar.TarEntryType.HardLink>, <xref:System.Formats.Tar.TarEntryType.SymbolicLink> and <xref:System.Formats.Tar.TarEntryType.V7RegularFile>.

Docs.exception: The entry type is not supported for creating an entry.
